answers.answer: I'm a bit bewildered with your subject matter as your content does not describe any autoimmune diabetes issues, but rather issues related to healing of your broken collar bone. This is not the forum to address that. If you are unhappy with your current doctor why don't you call around to see if another Orthopedic surgeon can take you in?

question: diagnosis with addissions then hypothyroid now it's normal....15 year period........my symptoms are still showing...broke my collar bone 6 mnths ago---seven inch plate My DR is a royal ...and pulled me off meds and told me that I should be healing faster;the nerve damage is extensive --I can't get out of bed most of the time....srceaming pain i think  he's wrong he won't give me a referral what should i do?
title: autoimmune
